content: the beginner-friendly crochet bear pattern is packed full of creative options to create both boy and girl bears in a variety of ways make the bears in their sweaters and embellish a bit more with pants skirts and bowties or hairbows before you know it you ll have a whole family of bears this is the perfect project for all skill levels for anyone wanting to create adorable bears but it was also specifically designed to help individuals progress from a newbie to an advanced beginner crocheter the project incorporates all the basic crochet techniques along with the skills of joining pieces together simple color changes working in the back loops a small amount of embroidery hand stitching and more the beginner-friendly bear is excellent for gifts decor bear lovers imaginative play and more pattern information + your pdf purchase includes written instructions and helpful photographs to aid in construction + the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology + the pattern is formatted to have one featured image at the beginning of the pattern for reference with all other full-sized images at the end for easy optional printing + the pattern includes a printable checklist that allows you to track your progress with each round/row and document the hook and yarn colors used print a new checklist each time you make the design and keep the master pattern free from markings to be used again and again skills needed + the skill level needed is advanced beginner + the techniques you will need to know include chain single_crochet standing single_crochet slip_stitch single_crochet increase invisible decrease working in the back bar of the chain double_crochet working in the back loop only the invisible finish joining a chain to form a loop and the adjustable magic ring + hand embroidery and stitching are also used in this project materials needed more specifics are noted within the pattern + yarn in your choice of colors about 130-165 yds/118-151 m of worsted/aran + a size e/4 3 5 mm crochet hook + stitch markers + tapestry needle + stuffing + pins + scissors + safety eyes + embroidery floss + embroidery needle + chopstick to help stuff finished measurements using hook size e/4 3 5 mm and worsted yarn the beginner-friendly bear measures approximately 8 25 inches 21 cm from the bottom of the foot to the tip of the ear thank you
